dojo_scroll_desc_kRoll.en-gb: The ROLL technique. Use for evasive actions and time your rolls on big landings to avoid a delay. Roll with the LEFT BUMPER.
dojo_scroll_desc_kRoll.pt-br: A técnica ROLL Tempo seus rolos em grandes aterrissagens para evitar um atraso.
dojo_scroll_desc_kRoll.de: Die ROLL-Technik. Zeit für große Landungen, um eine Verzögerung zu vermeiden.

dojo_scroll_desc_kDownwardDash.en-gb: The downward SMASH technique. Smash through obstacles with this technique. Press the RIGHT BUMPER in mid-air to trigger.
dojo_scroll_desc_kDownwardDash.pt-br: A técnica descendente de SMASH. Esmagar os obstáculos com esta técnica.
dojo_scroll_desc_kDownwardDash.de: Die abwärts gerichtete SMASH-Technik. Besiege Hindernisse mit dieser Technik.

dojo_scroll_desc_kSlowMotion.en-gb: The FOCUS technique. Slow down time. Hold the LEFT TRIGGER to activate.
dojo_scroll_desc_kSlowMotion.pt-br: A técnica FOCUS. Diminua o tempo. FAÇAM

dojo_scroll_desc_kCrouchJump.en-gb: The CROUCH-JUMP technique. Crouch down and then jump to reach higher highs.
dojo_scroll_desc_kCrouchJump.pt-br: A técnica CROUCH-JUMP. Agache-se e pule para alcançar máximas mais altas.
dojo_scroll_desc_kCrouchJump.de: Die CROUCH-JUMP-Technik. Crouch down und springe dann zu höheren Höhen.

dojo_scroll_desc_kDeflection.en-gb: The DEFLECT technique. Deflect projectiles with your knives and your sword.
dojo_scroll_desc_kDeflection.pt-br: A técnica DEFLECT. Desvie projéteis com suas facas e sua espada.
dojo_scroll_desc_kDeflection.de: Die DEFLECT-Technik. Lenken Sie Projektile mit Ihren Messern und Ihrem Schwert ab.

paper_pickup_title_test.de: Die DEFLECT-Technik. Lenken Sie Projektile mit Ihren Messern und Ihrem Schwert ab.

paper_pickup_desc_test.en-gb: Eliminate all threats and secure the forts. Leave no ... [illegible] ... and return all ...[illegible]
paper_pickup_desc_test.pt-br: Elimine todas ameaças e proteja os fortes. Não deixe ... [Ilegível] ... e retorne todos ... [Ilegível] ...
paper_pickup_desc_test.de: Die DEFLECT-Technik. Lenken Sie Projektile mit Ihren Messern und Ihrem Schwert ab.

key_desc_granary.en-gb: Opens the old Granary door in the forest
key_desc_granary.pt-br: Opens the old Granary door in the forest
key_desc_granary.de: Opens the old Granary door in the forest

suicide_note_desc.en-gb: I've had enough. You'll find most of her body in the water by the falls.

paper_pickup_desc_granary_key_hint.en-gb: Grain levels critical. Requesting an increase in supply. Granary key misplaced by Haruki. Haruki's last known location, old windmill. Punish Haruki.
paper_pickup_desc_granary_key_hint.pt-br: Grain levels critical. Requesting an increase in supply. Granary key misplaced by Haruki. Haruki's last known location, old windmill. Punish Haruki..
paper_pickup_desc_granary_key_hint.de: Grain levels critical. Requesting an increase in supply. Granary key misplaced by Haruki. Haruki's last known location, old windmill. Punish Haruki.

save_shrine_hint_desc.en-gb: I found a nearby hotspring. The healing waters saved me from my own memories. I feel like a new man. Can I make up for my sins?
save_shrine_hint_desc.pt-br: I found a nearby hotspring. The healing waters saved me from my own memories. I feel like a new man. Can I make up for my sins?
save_shrine_hint_desc.de: I found a nearby hotspring. The healing waters saved me from my own memories. I feel like a new man. Can I make up for my sins?

paper_pickup_gametip_projectile.en-gb: Use the RIGHT THUMBSTICK to throw a flying dagger
paper_pickup_gametip_projectile.pt-br: Use the RIGHT THUMBSTICK to throw a flying dagger
paper_pickup_gametip_projectile.de: Use the RIGHT THUMBSTICK to throw a flying dagger

key_desc_tools.en-gb: An assortment of woodworking tools. These could be useful for repairing something broken.
key_desc_tools.pt-br: An assortment of woodworking tools. These could be useful for repairing something broken.
key_desc_tools.de: An assortment of woodworking tools. These could be useful for repairing something broken.

key_desc_village_hut.en-gb: This key looks like it would open one of the common huts.
key_desc_village_hut.pt-br: This key looks like it would open one of the common huts.
key_desc_village_hut.de: This key looks like it would open one of the common huts.

paper_pickup_cave_clue_desc.en-gb: I told Akio about the hidden cave earlier. He was mad at me. He said it was too dangerous diving beneath the waterfall. I told him I had seen a stream of bubbles and had to investigate. That's what an adventurer does.
paper_pickup_cave_clue_desc.pt-br: I told Akio about the hidden cave earlier. He was mad at me. He said it was too dangerous diving beneath the waterfall. I told him I had seen a stream of bubbles and had to investigate. That's what an adventurer does.
paper_pickup_cave_clue_desc.de: I told Akio about the hidden cave earlier. He was mad at me. He said it was too dangerous diving beneath the waterfall. I told him I had seen a stream of bubbles and had to investigate. That's what an adventurer does.
